Recommendations: Sustain projects/activities and schedule monitoring and evaluation at certain critical stages in the life span of the project.
Include the VMGOs and Organizational Structure in the documents.
Use semi-permanent, and bigger posters preferably on tarpaulin at strategic places for wider dissemination.
Motivation and follow-up lectures should be periodically conducted.
Periodic monitoring of the projects should be given by the faculty.
Since the Extension project of the CBEA is the DUR-AS, dissemination and assistance should cover the adopted beneficiaries.
Ensure that the benefits of the extension program are enjoyed by the widest number of participants.
